===Etymology===
Traditionally said to have been a placename from the time of the sage-king [[w:Yao (ruler)|Yao]]. In fact, an early form of the name {{m|vi|Giao Chỉ}} seems to have been used by the native states for the area around the [[Red River]] delta prior to the Chinese conquest.

===Pronunciation===
{{zh-pron
|m=Jiāozhǐ
|cat=pn
}}

===Proper noun===
{{zh-proper noun}}

# {{lb|zh|historical}} [[Jiaozhi]] (交趾[[郡]]), the [[ancient]] [[Chinese]] [[commandery]] in [[northern]] [[Vietnam]] [[first]] [[established]] under the [[Han]] [[dynasty]].
# {{lb|zh|historical}} [[Jiaozhi]], a [[generic]] [[term]] for the [[land]]s [[south]] of the [[Five Ridges]] ([[Dayu]], [[Qitian]], [[Dupang]], [[Mengzhu]], and [[Yuecheng]]) in [[Liangguang]], [[essentially]] [[comprising]] [[North Vietnam]].
